data.name: Highest Average Cricket Score
data.description:
Bob and Alice are best friends. 

They also both love cricket! 

This season, they decided to record their scores and calculate the highest average at the end of the season. The scores are recorded in the following format:

`'B10A5B6A10B9A109B55A36'`

```
This string denotes the following:

Bob: 10

Alice: 5

Bob: 6

Alice: 10

Bob: 9

Alice: 109

Bob: 55

Alice: 36
```

Using these scores, Bob's average score is 20 and Alice's average score is 40 and the function should output `'Alice wins with an average of 40'`. 

If the average scores are equal, it should output `'Well played, average scores are equal'`.

An empty string should return `'No matches this season'`.

The average should be rounded to the nearest whole number.

Bob and Alice will always play the same number of matches.

Examples (Input --> Output):

```
'B10A1B5A1' --> 'Bob wins with an average of 8'

'A1B5A1B10' --> 'Bob wins with an average of 8'

'B1A100B10A100' --> 'Alice wins with an average of 100'

'B6A5B7A5B6A9B1A1' --> 'Well played, average scores are equal'

'' --> 'No matches this season'
```
